feed.title: Eric Gonzalez
feed.subtitle: I am a hard working individual who is ready to learn. What motivates me the most is my great deaI of curiosity. This allows me to grasp concepts very easily, especially when it comes to technology. I am looking for the opportunity to use my technical and marketing background to help a company excel. For this reason, I would love an opportunity in which I can delve into the art of computer-human interaction and UI/UX design.
